name: Koi-Koi: Love Blossoms Non-VR Edition
description:
[About Koi-Koi: Love Blossoms]

"KoiKoiVR" can now be played without VR!
Become the protagonist in a romance adventure game!
Enjoy a life full of excitement with two charming sisters at a hot spring resort!

Koume（Voice: 民安ともえ）

Sakura（Voice: 伊ヶ崎綾香）

Itsuha（Voice: 大宮若葉）



Costumes

[Outline]

The hot spring resort Tokoharu Koi-Koi Hot Spring is a ryokan famous for its plum and cherry trees, which bloom all year round.
However, a mysterious storm caused the two trees to lose all their beautiful blooms a few years ago.
The ryokan now faces a crisis—will it have to close down?

Having inherited this ryokan, you meet two sisters there who you discover to be old childhood friends.
—The cool and composed older sister Koume, and shy younger sister Sakura.
Spending time under the same roof, the three of you work towards restoring the ryokan to its former glory.

The innkeeper Itsuha tells you something completely unexpected.
The key to making the plum and cherry trees bloom again is forming a connection with the two sisters in both body and soul!
Do you choose just one of the girls, or perhaps both? It's up to you!

[A variety of fun gameplay]

Become the protagonist and experience the story in Adventure Mode.
Improve your compatibility with the heroines through your choices in conversation!

Experience multiple endings depending on your compatibility with each girl!
The heroines are fully voiced in Adventure Mode.

Challenge the hot spring's various minigames like table tennis in Action Mode!
*Action Mode can be accessed by playing through the main game.

Take a break from Adventure Mode and play with the heroines using the controller!
There are bonus modes where you can interact with the heroine whose heart belongs to you and improve your compatibility.

MiniGames



Make love bloom in this hot spring story!

KoiKoiVR is also available now.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1840350/VR/

Notes on downloading

・"Koi-Koi VR: Love Blossoms", "Koi-Koi: Love Blossoms Non-VR Edition" and "[DLC]Koi-Koi: Love Blossoms Non-VR Edition" have the same game content.
・Since "Koi-Koi VR: Love Blossoms" has been adjusted for PC, it is displayed as "Koi-Koi VR: Love Blossoms" in this game.
